resources.string: 1. Create a new project in Android Studio without Kotlins support.
2. Configure Kotlin in a new project (preferably manually).
4. Add the button to markup and hang on it Clicklistener in Activity.
5. To practice creating the classes and functions described in the lesson, and make sure that everything works. For example, create a test application:
a. Form Data Class with two properties and display them on the application screen.
B. Create Object. In Object, call Copy and display the values of the copied class on the screen.
C. Bring the values from different cycles to the console using examples from methodological materials.
6. Study the Yandex API, see examples and register as a developer, get your developer key.
7. To study the API database with films and register as a developer, get your developer key.
8. Decide on the screens and tools of your future application with films based on the capabilities of the API.
